about_the_game:
Hey kids! You know what's cool? VOTING.

Voting is super cool and hip and Steve Buscemi.

If you live in the United States of America, remember to VOTE during the Midterm Elections on November 6th!
But vote for an actual person. Not a fictional character, not someone who is not running. An actual candidate. That would be mega rad.

Alt-outfits for all party members.
Plus 4 alt-outfits for the secret party members.

TO ACCESS: Go to the storage area in the Engine Room, and click on Power Runes.
